title: Is La Campanella the hardest song to play? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s quite difficult technically. However, from the Common Practice Period, Balakirev’s “Islamey” is considered harder. Many pianists the I have known have said that if interpretation is included, much of the regular repertoire of Beethoven, Bach, Brahms, Chopin, Rachmaninoff, etc. is harder (and other Liszt’s stuff for that matter.)
